Summary: Looked up and saw bright star-like light object move upward and out of sight.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around May 14th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter and I were sitting out on the front porch talking and I looked up to the sky(?) and saw a very bright star-like object, thinking that I hadn't noticed it before. Then it started moving upward and out of vision or sight. My daughter also saw it because she looked up to the sky when I did to see what I was looking up at. (I really don't know what the distance was - that the object was up in the sky). It did not take more than 20 to 25 secound for this to happen. We just sat their for a few moments because we were so startled and shocked.
